resources.string:
*** ROOT-ed phone required *** You can\'t use this program without rooted phone, but you can try KeystoreActivator instead.
You need this application only if you are using WiFi (not only) authentication which hold keys and certificates in a secure storage (keystore). This application can unlock your keystore each time your phone starts.
Wrong password. Trials left: %d. In case you fail all the attempts, keystore will be erased
Failed to gain root privileges. You should confirm permanent root access for this application
"su" program was not found.\nCan\'t run without it
Unlock keystore. You should confirm permanent root access for this application
Unlock keystore each time device starts
\'su\' command not found. Please install it.
\'su\' permission declined. Please allow \'su\' for AutoKeystore
unable to connect to keystore service
Failed to receive keystore service result
Keystore service command is too big
Failed to change keystore client user id
Failed to invoke command. Exit code %d
